title: Hackers/Scammers/Riot Support
body: to the asshole who hacked my account and got me banned....thank you. And to riot support....F#ck you. If you can see this i wanna congratulate you on a on job well done. thanks for banning my account and not telling me why and to anyone who's put money into this game. just save it you never know when riot might just decide to take everything you've worked for and not show you why your being banned or get you any incite. i hope your company falls apart and goes bankrupt. fuck you have  a nice day.

replies.body:
"hackers".

Your account has last played game 2 days ago, and they look totally legitimate - not bot or sold account, not to mention the timeframe makes no sense and the champs look the same going back.

You fucked up, dont try to blame hackers. If riot investigates, they will probably find it is all the same IP range anyway.

i've had one or 2 games on twitch with bots that was a ranked game with 15 plus kills on a adc i dont know how to play and i can bet you can go threw my history and see i've never carried a game with lee sin i'm bad at em. and why the fuck would i cheat and still be in bronze for 3 years. they already said i'm not gettin my account why make more tickets and i can bet if they did investigate the last two games play would be nowhere near this i.p.. i'm done with the game anyway i dont give a fuck what you think.

> and why the fuck would i cheat and still be in bronze for 3 years

I never even mentioned or thought of boosting, but now i know what you are feeling guilty about..

and what exactly should i feel guilty about. i'm not some lcs wanna be i just like to play for fun not once have i used any sort script or bot to win games i'm pissed cause ive had almost all champis unlocked and a shitload of skins and then i get banned for something i didnt do.
Maybe try doing something constructive and raise a support ticket with Riot to look into the problem if you actually want the account.
